loans.name: Marta Gloria

texts.es:
Marta, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, este negocio lo aprendió por medio de unos vecinos y ya tiene 4 años de realizar esta actividad.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de marañón cruda, para tener la suficiente disponibilidad para procesarla y generar más ventas.
El objetivo de Marta es mantener el negocio con la ayuda de los prestamos, ampliándose a otra zona, para crecer y mejorar sus ganancias.

loans.use: Compra de semilla de marañón cruda.

loans.name: Elda Elena

texts.es:
Elda, vive en casa propia, con su esposo y tiene tres niños, ella administra una pupuseria de la cual se mantiene con su familia, este negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de su esposo, tiene un año de estar trabajándolo, lo atiende todos los días de la semana por las tardes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de una plancha para hacer pupusas, y además algunos ingredientes para preparar la venta como el aceite, maíz, quesillo y chicharrón. Esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar el negocio. 
Su objetivo es con el trabajo poderle dar a sus hijos una mejor vida, con la oportunidad de mejorar su futuro.

loans.use: Compra de una plancha para hacer pupusas.

loans.name: Pabla

texts.es:
La señora Pabla esta agradecida por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual lo utilizo para invertir en mercancía para su negocio de papelería escolar.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la elaboración de un cuarto de madero y así ampliar más el local y poner la rentas de computadoras, ya que sus clientes le están solicitando este tipo de servicio. 
Doña Pabla es viuda y tiene dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad, un ya mayor de edad quien le ayuda con los gastos de la casa y la mas pequeña que esta en edad escolar. Desea que sus hijos tengan lo mejor. 
La señora Pabla quiere que su negocio tenga mas ganancias y ingreso a su familia, es por eso que solicita el préstamo para invertirle en su negocio.

loans.use: Elaboración de un cuarto de madera al frente de la casa

loans.name: Santos Eduardo

texts.es:
Santos, es ganadero, tiene casa propia en la que vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, él se dedica a la compra y venta de ganadería, desde hace 3 años esta realizando el negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado, pues su intensión es crecer en el negocio, mejorando su condición e ingresos para la familia.
La aspiración de él  es que a través de los préstamos pueda mejorar las condiciones económicas de la familia, asegurándoles un mejor futuro.

loans.use: Compra de ganado.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: La Sra. Gabriela  tiene 34 años y es casada con una  hija de la edad de 11 años, ella se dedica al tejido a mano de mantas de lana su taller se encuentran ubicado en la zona del  Calvario,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, Gabriela  usara este préstamo  para la compra de lana por cantidad y otros materiales que necesita par su actividad,  Gabriela no tiene ningún reto por que ella esta fuera del nivel de competencia de las demás tiendas ya que su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y tiene muchos pedidos, y utilizara los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales para ir tejiendo mas mantas que le dan buenos ingresos, con el tiempo desea exportar sus productos al exterior  e implementar maquinas tejedoras y personal de apoyo, es una persona emprendedora con ganas de superación se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado

loans.use: Compra de Lana y materiales para el tejido de mantas

loans.name: Wadea

texts.en:
This is Wadea, 33, resident of Sana`a, Yemen. He is married and a father of 2 children. he, manages their household while operating his business. He is working hard to continually provide income for his family everyday expenses. 

Wadea operates a pharmacy. He earns by getting medicines from different companies and selling by the packet. He started his business by working as employee in a company who enable to open his business.
He requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy medicines for his business.
He hopes to grow his business in the coming years and dreams to be able to give his children a good and high quality education through all his hard work on her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines for his business

loans.name: Ana Beatriz

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de calzado, vive con sus hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, desde hace 8 años estar vendiendo calzado, lo inicio con el apoyo de su padre.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de calzado, sandalias y zapatos formales, para damas y caballeros, este préstamo le ayudara a contar con más variedad y nuevos estilos, para seguir manteniendo a la clientela y atraer a nuevos.
Ella espera contar con este apoyo para crecer en el mercado, con la aspiración de poder tener un local propio.

loans.use: Compra de calzado, sandalias y zapatos formales, para damas y caballeros

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba cooks banku for sale she serves it with fried fish, pepper and tomatoes sauce at Agensudo near Elmina. She is divorced  and has 4 children.  Aba has done this since 3 years.  She uses her income to assists her husband to pay their accomodation bills. Her loan will be used to  . She hopes to use the new profits from her expanded business to mount a stall for the sale of her cooked banku and fish.

loans.use: purchase bags of maize and fish which she use to preparing her banku for sale

loans.name: Noemi Arely

texts.es:
Noemí, vive en casa propia, con su hija y su madre, se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene 9 años de estar en el negocio, con el cual ha podido proveer para su familia todo lo necesario.
Ella está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de de más mercadería, como blusas, faldas, ropa interior, ropa de niño, este préstamo le ayudara a tener más variedad de productos y mejorar sus ventas.
La aspiración de Noemí es tener más mercadería disponible, surtido los estilos y poder tener un nuevo local.

loans.use: Compra de blusas, faldas, ropa interior, ropa de niño.

loans.name: Fusena

texts.en: Fusena  sells water melon, and oranges  at Ayensudo near Elmina, which she has done for 15 years now she is married and has 3 children.  She uses her income to support the husband to pay their children’s school fees. Fusena will use her loan to buy water melon and oranges for sale. With the new profit  she will expand her business

loans.use: buy water melon and oranges for sale

loans.name: Raul Mariano

texts.es:
Raúl, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, la vivienda es propia, desde hace tres años está en el negocio de la compra y venta de chatarra y productos reciclables, atiende todos los días.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para la venta, ya que recorre varias zonas para conseguir chatarra, latas, y otros materiales que se pueden reciclar, el los vende a un precio mayor, obteniendo un margen de ganancia.
La aspiración de Raúl es tener un vehículo propio para transportar los materiales, ya que abarcaria más zonas y con más capacidad para almacenar.

loans.use: Compra de chatarra y latas.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia is a fish monger, She buy the fresh fish from the market and fries it for sale at Ayensudo near Elmina. She is married and has 4 children.  The husband works with  a transport company. She uses her  income to assists her husband to pay their accomodation bills. Her loan will be used to  purchase  fresh  fish to fry for sale. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business

loans.use: purchase  fresh  fish to fry for sale

loans.name: Asibe

texts.en: Asibe  sells cooked rice,  She serves it with  macroni, meat and fish stew at Ayensudo near Elmina.  Asibe has been selling cooked rice for the past 12 years now. She is divorced and has 3 children.   Asibe uses her income to feed and cloth her children.  Her loan will be used to  Asibe will use her new profit to expand her business.

loans.use: purchase bags of rice, meat and fish to prepare her food for sale.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta y reparación de bicicletas, tiene 10 años en el negocio, este lo heredo de un tío.
Él está solicitando un préstamo  para la compra de repuestos en variedad para la reparación de las bicicletas, como pedales, cadenas, frenos, para mantener surtido el negocio y realizar los trabajos que los clientes necesiten. 
La aspiración de Carlos es crecer en clientela, tener mayor reconocimiento en la zona, ya que esto le permitirá tener un taller más rentable.

loans.use: Para la compra de repuestos para bicicletas.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace    cooks   rice and fish stew for sale at Ayesudo near Elmina.  Grace  is divorced  and has 3 children.  She has been into this business for some years.  She uses her income  to feed, cloth and pays her children’s school fees.  She will use her loan to purchase bags of rice, fish and  other ingredient to prepare her food  to sell.  With the new profit,   Grace plans to buld a better stall for the sale of her food.

loans.use: purchase bags of rice, fish and  other ingredient to prepare her food  to sell

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary   is a baker, she bakes  bread  for sale at Ayensudo near Elmina.  She is married  and has 3 children. Mary has been baking for 25 years now.  She  uses her income  to support the husband  to feed and cloth  their children.  She will use her loan to purchase bags of flour, sugger and  cooking oil for her bakery.  She hopes to expand her business form the new profit.

loans.use: purchase bags of flour, sugger and  cooking oil for her bakery.

loans.name: Claudia Yesenia

texts.es:
Claudia, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 2 años de edad, ella trabaja junto a su esposo en la agricultura, lo aprendió con sus padres, y tiene tres años de estar realizando sus propias siembras con el esposo para la alimentación de la familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 1000 plantas de chile y abono para aplicarlos a la plantación, este préstamo le ayudara para poder realizar la inversión necesaria en el cultivo.
El objetivo de Claudia es trabajar para salir adelante económicamente con su familia, con el trabajo agrícola para tener el sustento diario para su hogar.

loans.use: Para la compra de 1000 plantas de chile y abono.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda  sells water melon, and oranges  at Ayensudo near Elmina, which she has done for 5 years now she is married to a driver and has 4 children.  She uses her income to support the husband to pay their children’s school fees.  Linda will use her loan to buy water melon and oranges to sale. With the new profit  she will expand her business

loans.use: buy water melon and oranges to sale.

loans.name: Hassana

texts.en: Hassana owns this cosmetics shop, she sells body cream and hair creams. She lives together with her husband who is a teacher and 3 children at Ayensudo near Elmiina. She uses her income to assists the husband for the general up keep of their family. Hassana will use her loan to purchase more cosmetics to sells. With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: purchase more cosmetics to sells.

loans.name: Rosa Delia

texts.es:
Rosa Delia, tiene 28 años de edad, casada desde hace 13 años, vive en una aldea de Morazán, Yoro con su familia y sus dos hijos de 9 y 11 años de edad.

Rosa Delia, hace 3 años que se dedica a vender mercadería como cosméticos, cremas, aretes, pulseras, collares, champú, adornos de casa y utensilios de cocina. Este negocio lo comenzó con dinero propio y ahora está solicitando un préstamo a ODEF de 10,000 Lempiras para surtir de mas productos de cosméticos accesorios para damas, utensilios de cocina y otros, con esta inversión va incrementar las ventas.
Su meta es llegar a tener un negocio grande para obtener ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar su casa y las condiciones familiares.

loans.use: Surtir el negocio de cosmeticos, cremas, champu, utensilios de cocina, aretes, pulceras y adornos de casa.

loans.name: Alma Azucena

texts.es:
Alma, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, alquilan vivienda, se dedica a la venta de sorbete y destazo, tiene 4 años de estar en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia con su esposo, ellos viven de su negocio.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de sorbetes, paletas, conos, de diferentes sabores, esto le incrementara el negocio de los helados, para poder mejorar el servicio a los clientes, fortaleciéndose para obtener mejores utilidades.
El objetivo de Alma es mantener el negocio ya que depende de él, para apoyar a sus hijos.

loans.use: Compra de sorbetes, paletas, conos.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en: Mariama  is a fruits vender she sells pea and water melon at Ayensudo near Elmina  which she has done for 5 years. She is a married to a driver and has 4 childern.  She uses her income to assist the husband to  pay their children’s school fees  feed. Mariama will use her loan to purchase variety of fruit to sell. With the new profit, she will expand her business

loans.use: purchase variety of fruit to sell.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is a fruits vender she sells pineapples and water melon at Ayensudo near Elmina  which she has done for 5 years. She is a married to a farmer and has 4 childern.  She uses her income to assist the husband to pay their children’s school fees.  Ekua will use her loan to purchase variety of fruit to sell. With the new profit, she will expand her business

loans.use: purchase variety of fruit to sell

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita  she operate a an  agriculture chemicals  at Ayensudo near Elmiina. She is married with 3 children her husband is a farmer. She has been into this business for 3 years now. She uses her income to support the husband to feed and cloth their children. Anita will use her loan to purchase more  agriculture chemicals for sale.  With the new profit, she will expand her business

loans.use: purchase more  agriculture chemicals for sale.

loans.name: Patricia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Patricia, se dedica a la venta de ropa, bolsones, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos de 13, 10 Y 8 años de edad, quienes son dependientes, Patricia tiene ya tres años de estar en el negocio, aprendió por medio de su suegra, quien la incentivo para que iniciara en el área del mercado.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de blusas frescas, short, sandalias, pelotas, aprovechando la temporada de vacaciones, este préstamo le ayudara para mantener el negocio, en estos días poder disponer de mercadería ya que aumenta la demanda, porque la gente busca estos productos de temporada.
La aspiración de Patricia es seguir trabajando, crecer en el comercio, para velar por las necesidades de sus hijos, ayudándoles a superarse como profesionales.

loans.use: Compra de blusas frescas, short, sandalias, pelotas.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua  produce palm oil for sale, she has been into this business for 10 years now. She lives together with her husband who is farmer and 3 children. Ekua uses her income to support the husband to pay their utility bills.  Ekua  will use her loan to purchase palm fruit to produce the oil for sale. With the new profit, she want  to buy machine for the production of her oil.

loans.use: purchase palm fruit to produce the oil for sale

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino, es agricultor, vive con su esposa  y un nieto de 15 años, Faustino está dedicado a la siembra de hortalizas, tiene más de 20 años en el oficio, produciendo tomates, pepino, chile, maíz, ejotes, frijoles, trabaja a tiempo completo.
Él esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de tomate, chile, pepino, ejote, abono, para poder iniciar el cultivo, con la intención de que este préstamo le ayude para incrementar su cosecha.
La aspiración de don Faustino es apoyar con su trabajo a la superación de su nieto, para que pueda prepararse profesionalmente.

loans.use: Compra de semilla de tomate, chile, pepino, ejote y abono.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Inés, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, pupusas, y una tienda de productos domésticos, ella aprendió este oficio en su familia, tiene 12 años de estar realizándolo, ya que es una ayuda para las necesidades del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña, chicharrón, aceite, quesillo, pastas, gaseosas, boquitas, detergentes, este préstamo le ayudara para surtir todo el negocio, teniendo la materia prima para la tortillas, las pupusas, y algunos productos para la tienda, mejorando la producción y los ingresos.
El objetivo de Inés, es ampliar el negocio de la tienda, mejorar el local donde tiene la mercadería, agregar otros productos para llamar más clientes.

loans.use: Compra de maíz, leña, chicharrón, aceite, quesillo, pastas, gaseosas.

loans.name: Alvaro David

texts.es:
Alvaro tiene 27 años de edad, vive en la linda ciudad de Imperial, la cual es conocida por su clima cálido, por su agricultura y sobre todo porque sus pobladores irradian de generosidad.  Alvaro es muy optimista, estuvo a punto de casarse pero sufrió el engaño de la que en ese entonces era su novia, se deprimió un poco pero al final tomo la decisión de seguir adelante, debido a los pocos recursos de sus padres ya no pudo culminar la carrera de ingeniería, a pesar de esos contratiempos él supo idearse la manera de trabajar para surgir, empezó trabajando en el campo, en especial el cultivo de maíz, logro ahorrar y pudo comprar una combi en la cual está trabajando actualmente, el es muy carismático y los clientes siempre se sienten a gusto cuando toman sus servicios, por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio.

Alvaro está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo y compra algunos repuestos, lo que permitirá que su vehículo este en buenas condiciones para el transporte de los clientes y podrá tener mayor seguridad, así seguirá trabajando cada día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar otra combi y tener una empresa de transporte, para que sus padres se sientan orgullosos.

loans.use: Para mantenimiento y compra de repuestos de su vehiculo

loans.name: William Alberto

texts.es:
William, vive con sus padres, no tiene hijos, él trabaja como panificador por las mañanas, en las tardes de dedica a vender el pan.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de un horno en su vivienda, este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de iniciar con la panaderia propia, aunque con poca cantidad pero tendra la facilidad de mejorar la producción del negocio en el aumento de pan.
La aspiración de William es tener una panadería fuerte, con mayor capacidad de producción, aumentando el número de clientes.

loans.use: Para la construccion de un horno.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
María, vive con sus tres nietos y un hijo, la casa en la que reside en propia, ella se dedica a la venta de mariscos, tiene 5 años de estar dedicada a la venta, de la cual ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mariscos en variedad, por ejemplo pescado fresco  y seco, almejas, conchas, camarones, esto le ayudara a mantener surtido y variedad de especies de mariscos, para tener más oportunidades de venta. 
La aspiración de María es que a través del negocio pueda comprarse a futuro un vehículo para transportar la mercadería.

loans.use: Compra de pescado fresco  y seco, almejas, conchas, camarones.

loans.name: Claudia Veronica

texts.es:
Claudia, vive con sus hijos y esposo en casa propia, administra un bazar, lo tiene desde hace 5 años, los hijos la apoyan y su esposo, para atender el negocio, pues este es un aporte importante para los ingresos del hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el negocio, blusas, ropa interior, recuerdos, porta foto, entre otros que son necesarios para mejorar el inventario y ofrecer a los clientes más variedad.
El objetivo de Claudia es tener mayores ventas, creciendo en el negocio, para que su familia cuente con un mejor nivel de ingresos.

loans.use: Compra de blusas, ropa interior, recuerdos, porta foto.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto, administra una tienda de productos de primera necesidad, tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, el negocio lo administra desde hace 7 años, lo fundó junto a su esposa, actualmente solo él es responsable del negocio, pues su esposa falleció hace 6 meses, el horario de atención de Rigoberto es desde las 5:00am hasta las 7:00pm.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, pollo, y otros productos para la tienda, que son de primera necesidad, el préstamo le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y con las ganancias cubrir sus necesidades.
La aspiración de Rigoberto es darle vida al negocio haciéndolo crecer, ya que depende únicamente de él para mantenerse con todos sus gastos.

loans.use: Compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, pollo.

loans.name: Doris Estela

texts.es:
Doris continúa en su negocio de ropa y se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de vestidos, faldas, blusas y ropa interior, variando los estilos y los colores para aumentar la demanda en clientes.
Con el préstamo anterior ella logro cancelar un pedido de ropa para epoca de las fiestas, con el que creció no solo en venta si no también en clientes.

loans.use: Para la compra de vestidos, faldas, blusas y ropa interior.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Maximo de 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 20 y 16 años, por los cuales trabaja muchísimo para que sean felices y que tengan una buena calidad de vida,; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad donde alberga la mayor población afroperuana de nuestro país y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, asimismo sus pobladores tienen un don particular, cocinan de manera deliciosa y sobre todo son personas muy carismáticas y amables. Cuando Maximo dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta escuchar las noticias para poder estar enterado de lo pasa en la actualidad; asimismo le encanta disfrutar uno de sus platillos favoritos, el cual es el riquísimo “arroz con pato”.

Con mucho carisma Maximo abre su negocio de venta de abarrotes desde tempranas horas de la mañana, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 35 clientes en el dia, el cree que le va bien en el negocio porque brinda una buena atención al público.

Maximo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio en especial arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, entre otros; lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer y así seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una gran tienda y ser un gran microempresario”.

loans.use: Para la compra de mercaderia (arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, entre otros).

loans.name: Alis Cecilia

texts.es:
Alis Cecilia tiene 43 años de edad, es casada  y tiene 6 hijos de 19, 16, 14, 11, 9 y 10 años vive en una Colonia de San Pedro Sula. 
Doña Alis  tiene un negocio de venta de calzado específicamente tenis para caballeros y niños. Inicio este negocio con la convicción de generar un ingreso más al hogar.  Logro establecerlo con sus propios esfuerzos. Lleva trabajando en su negocio 18 años el cual lo tiene en un puesto del mercado de la ciudad. Manifiesta  que le ha ido muy bien porque las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas son rentables y de las cuales ha seguido reinvirtiendo para mantenerlo estable.
Lleva dos préstamos con ODEF y actualmente solicito otro de 10,000 lempiras para más mercadería como zapatos (tenis) tanto como caballeros y niños. Con esta inversión lograra aumentar su inventario y obteniendo los ingresos rentables para la sostenibilidad de su familia.
Su meta es seguir trabajando en su negocio para en el futuro hacerlo mas grande.

loans.use: Comprar calzado para la venta.

loans.name: Percy Gerardo

texts.es:
Percy es un esposo amoroso y un padre ejemplar, de 2 maravillosos jóvenes de 19 ,16 y una hija de 17 años, a los cuales ama muchísimo y por los cuales da la vida y se esfuerza a diario para sacarlos adelante para que sean personas de bien y sean felices, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, sus playas hermosas y sobre todo la generosidad de su gente. Percy es un hombre trabajador con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes en la bodega que tiene en su vivienda, pero también trabaja en una panificadora en horas de la mañana en especial a las 5 de la mañana, ya que el nos comenta que siempre un dinerito extra es bueno; su  negocio de abarrotes lleva ya 3 años, 3 años en los cuales ha sabido ganarse la simpatía de los clientes, por ello el  cree que le va bien en su negocio.

Percy está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la gracias ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras para su negocio como reparar el techo ya que actualmente es de caña de Guayaquil con barro, también cambiara su portón ya que actualmente ya esta viejito y oxidado y también cambiar su puerta ya que como es de manera está totalmente apolillada y también comprar andamios, asi podra tener mayor seguridad en su negocio y brindar mas comodidad a los clientes que van a su negocio, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y hacer realidad su gran sueño.” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos y lo más importante que sean felices”.

loans.use: Para arreglos de techo, compra de puerta y arreglo de porton.

loans.name: Ana Lisbeth

texts.es: Ana es originaria de León, de 31 años de edad, de oficio comerciante en el negocio de comideria, madre de 2 hijos los cuales están a su cargo. Ella inicio su actividad ayudándole a su mama en lo que es la elaboración de la comida luego decidió independizarse poniendo su propio negocio de comida desde hace 5 años recibiendo siempre el apoyo de su mama ya que cocinan las dos, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad y con la gente que circulan por la zona que se detienen a probar sus platillos. Cuenta con otros ingresos pues recibe remesas de parte de su compañero de vida. Solicita el préstamo para comprar plátanos, pollo, carne, repollo asi como todos los insumos  necesarios para la elaboración de sus comidas ya que este le ayudara para contar con una reserva debido a que los precios de los productos cada día van subiendo aun más.

loans.use: Para comprar plátanos, pollo, carne, repollo.

loans.name: Ivania Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ivania de 51 años de edad es originaria de León, realizo estudios de  Licenciatura en Enfermería, soltera, de oficio comerciante, madre de  3 hijos los cuales todos tienen vida independiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa usada actividad que la inicio desde hace más de 6 años con esfuerzo propio, comercializa sus  productos en su misma comunidad y en los alrededores de la zona contando solo con esos ingresos, recibe el apoyo de sus hijos en sus tiempos libres, sus expectativas son comercializar sus productos siempre en la misma zona y contar con variedades de ropa para tener diferentes productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes.
Realiza el préstamo para invertir más en el negocio en la compra de camisas, pantalones, shorts y calzados para ambos sexos con el objetivo de obtener más ingresos. Este le ayudara ya que podrá comprar mas productos para su clientela, como  planes futuros espera llegar a superarse aun más tratando de mantener su negocio siempre surtido con ropa y calzado.

loans.use: compra de camisas, pantalones, shorts y calzados para ambos sexos.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam de oficio comerciante en el negocio de restaurante es originaria de León, de 58 años de edad, soltera, madre de 7 hijos de los cuales 2 están a su cargo ya que los demás tienen vida independiente. Inicio su actividad a los 32 años de edad, es apoyada por  su hija atendiendo a los clientes que visitan el lugar, donde se ofrece el menú de las diferentes comidas y variadas bebidas que tendrán en el día, su expectativa es mejorar la infraestructura del negocio para una mejor presentación. Realiza el crédito para abastecer el negocio con la compra de gaseosas, jugos, carne, plátanos, pollo, arroz asi como todos los insumos  necesarios para mantener el negocio. Este préstamo ayudara ya que podrá mejorar las condiciones del negocio para dar una mejor presentación con el objetivo de  mejorar  la atención de los clientes ya que se acerca la temporada de mejores ventas  en la comunidad donde podrá obtener mas ingresos, como planes futuros espera poder agrandar el negocio asi como prestar el servicio de tour en el mar.

loans.use: compra de gaseosas, jugos, carne, plátanos, pollo, arroz.

loans.name: Rufino Antonio

texts.es: Rufino de 42 años de edad es originario de León, de oficio comerciante, padre de 7 hijos de los cuales solo dos están a su cargo ya que los otros son mayores de edad  tienen vida independiente. El se dedica a uno de las actividades más conocida en nuestro país como es la pesca   trabajo que inicio desde los 12 años de edad ya que su papa también era pescador ahora cuenta con 30  años de realizar esta actividad siendo este su primer negocio, sus productos los comercializa en su misma comunidad recibiendo el apoyo de su esposa, sus expectativas es llegar a tener sus propias herramientas de trabajo. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de un freezer ya que este le servirá para el almacenamiento de pescado y poder vender un nuevo producto, sus planes futuros es crecer en su negocio para poner una pulpería.

loans.use: para la compra de un freezer

loans.name: Kenia Patricia

texts.es:
Kenia de 21 años de edad  originaria de León,  es una joven que a su corta edad  ya se dedica al oficio comerciante tiene como negocio un restaurante de comidas caseras ubicado cerca de la playa, soltera, transcursa sus estudios universitarios. Inicio su actividad desde hace 2 años cuando la mama le heredo un rancho para la venta de comidas ricas ya que la mama siempre a tenido negocio cerca de la playa, en el negocio recibe el apoyo de su mama que le ayuda en la elaboración de las comidas, sus expectativas son crecer en el negocio hasta llegar acondicionarlo para darle una mejor vista.
Kenia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como pescados, granos básicos como arroz, harina,  aceite, entre otros. Este crédito le será de mucha ayuda pues podrá comprar los productos que sean de mayor venta en la época, sus planes futuros es hacer del negocio un lugar turístico porque se considera una joven con perspectivas de negocio.

loans.use: Para comprar insumos como pescados, granos básicos como arroz, harina,  aceite, entre otros.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 54 years old and is a married woman with 4 children aged between 14 and 29. She is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. She primarily grows rice crops to sell. Marina also sells food items like pancakes, rice cakes and banana cue to her community. She works hard to send her children to school.

Marina has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and ingredients such as sugar, flour and cooking oil. This will help increase Marina's business profitability. She plans to use any extra profit to pay for school expenses and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and ingredients such as sugar, flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Apolinar

texts.en:
Apolinar is a married man with 5 children. He is a farmer working in San Miguel, Bohol. Apolinar has been growing and selling rice for more than 10 years. He works hard to keep his farm productive and provide for his family.

Apolinar has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. Apolinar hopes to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. She is 48 years old, married with 9 children. Four of whom are already adults.

Belinda cultivates her land to grow rice crops. Her produce are used for family consumption and selling. Belinda is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor. She is happy that this loan will help her fund her farm. Belinda is hoping to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor

loans.name: Armando

texts.en: Armando is 37 years old and is a married man with 3 young children ages 3, 6 and 7. Armando has had a refrigeration business for 6 years. He also delivers Globe Telecom's bills to earn an extra income. Armando works hard to sustain his family and save for his children's education. He requested this loan to purchase tools and other spare parts. Armando hopes to succeed in his endeavors.

loans.use: to purchase tools and other spare parts

loans.name: Cecile

texts.en:
Cecile is 30 years old and is a married woman with 4 children with ages between 3 and 10. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Cecile is a seaweed farmer. She earns 2000 PHP per month doing this farming. She requested a loan to purchase seaweeds, straw and wooden pegs. This will help Cecile's business profitability. Cecile plans to use any extra income to renovate their house.

loans.use: to purchase seaweeds, straw and wooden pegs

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a 44-year-old married woman with 3 children ages 13, 18 and 22. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Corazon has had her sari-sari store business for 10 years. She sells items like canned goods, milk and snacks. Corazon also sells fresh fish to her community. Each month, she earns 10000 PHP with her businesses. She has requested this loan to buy more items to sell such as canned goods and dried fish. Corazon hopes to be able to sustain her children's education through her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as canned goods and dried fish

loans.name: Daniela

texts.en: 63-year-old Daniela is a married woman with 2 children ages 23 and 28. Her husband works as a farmer. Daniela is also a farmer and has been growing rice for 25 years. She works hard to keep their farm productive and their family healthy. She requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds. Daniela hopes to be rich in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en:
Dionesia is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. She is 53 years old, married and has 11 children, 6 of whom are still school-aged. Dionesia's husband is also a farmer.

Dionesia primarily grows rice crops to sell. She earns about 3000 PHP per month doing this farming. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. Dionesia plans to use any extra income to pay for school expenses and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma is 57 years old and is a married woman with a 19-year-old child. She has had a sari-sari store business for 10 years. She sells softdrinks, bread, vinegar, soy sauce and other various items. Guillerma earns about 3000 PHP per month from her store.

Guillerma is requesting a loan to buy more items to sell such as softdrinks, salt, sugar and canned goods. She hopes to earn better and be able to sustain her child's education.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as softdrinks, salt, sugar and canned goods

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.en: Ignacia is a married woman with 6 children ages 14 to 27. Her husband is a farmer. Ignacia also works as a farmer. She helps her husband till their land and grow rice crops. According to Ignacia, she earns 9000 PHP per month doing this farming. She requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds. Ignacia hopes for her family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 32 years old and is a married woman with 4 children with ages 4, 6, 8 and 12. Irene's husband is a fisherman.

Irene has been a seaweed farmer for 7 years. She earns about 5000 PHP per month with seaweed farming. She also supports her husband's fishing and helps him sell his catch at the market. Irene has requested a loan to purchase straw, seaweeds and gasoline for the fishing boat. Irene hopes that through her loan, her business will prosper.

loans.use: to purchase straw, seaweeds and gasoline for the fishing boat

loans.name: Hajba

texts.en:
Hajba is a 42 year old, smiling, kind mother of 5. She is a married Iraqi woman who has been using her sewing skills for 13 years, working from home on various custom orders. Hajba takes pride in meeting the demands of the household, taking care of the children and contributing to the family's income. 

In the past Hajba successfully applied, received and repaid a Relief International - Iraq Microfinance loan, which she used to purchase an iron some tools and raw materials to improve her sewing business. 

Today Hajba took a new loan in the amount of 1800 USD to improve her work area with the purchase of some small furniture items and to also purchase fabric and other raw materials.

loans.use: to improve her work area and to purchase fabric and other raw materials

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en:
Jihad is photographed in his store while he is preparing to open his project.
Jihad is a 27 year old single young man, he prepares to open a store for selling mobile phones and its accessories to customers, which will be a profitable project, since there is a high customer demand on this type of goods. 

Jihad is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing mobile phones and collection of its accessories. This will enable Jihad to prepare well for opening his store and to offer variety collection of mobile phones and its accessories for sale, this will help to increase sales and improve Jihad's income and create to him bright future.

loans.use: To purchase bulk of mobile phones and its accessories

loans.name: Suha

texts.en:
Suha is photographed in her office in the training center she has.
Suha is a 37 year old woman, she is married with two sons and two daughters, her husband is employed with a salary not enough to cover all the family's costs and needs.

For the past two years, Suha has been opening a training center to enhance the student's skills in using computer and other related topics, which has been a profitable project.

Suha is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing computers to use them for training purposes. This will enable Suha to have more number of students in the center, which will increase number of training courses the center held and improve Suha's income positively.

loans.use: To purchase computers for the training center she has.

loans.name: Anees

texts.en:
Anees is photographed in his store.
Anees is a 22 year old single young man, he has a mobile phone store since six months ago, which is a profitable project and the only source of income to him.

Anees is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more mobile phones for sale and improving the store's condition such as: installing new shelves and installing additional lights. This will offer to Anees better collection of mobile phones in his store, which will increase sales and improve the store's condition to have better look and so increase Anees's income.

loans.use: To purchase more mobile phones for sale and improve the store's condition

loans.name: Jehan

texts.en:
Jehan is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Khaled appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Jehan is a 27 year old young woman, she is married to Khaled who is a construction contractor works with his father and gets a salary, which is not enough to cover all the life's costs.

Jehan is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing construction supplies to finish number of stores he has such as: installing tiles, bleaching and painting, in order to lease them. This will enable Jehan's husband to improve the store's condition and have the opportunity to lease them to customers soon, which will increase and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase construction supplies to finish number of stores he has to lease them

loans.name: Mayson

texts.en:
Mayson is photographed while she is sewing clothes.
Mayson is a 38 year old single woman, for the past 12 years, Mayson has been sewing and selling clothes to customers, which has been a profitable project and makes her familiar among costumers.

Mayson is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new additional sewing machine as she has alot of requests from customers. This will enable Mayson to meet the demands of customers on time and improve her only source of income to better.

loans.use: To complete purchasing sewing machine

loans.name: Atallah

texts.en:
Atallah is photographed in his restaurant.

Atallah is a 52 year old man, he is married and a father with three sons and four daughters, one of his sons is working with him in the restaurant.

For the past 8 years, Atallah has been opening this food restaurant, which is a well known restaurant among customers and located in the middle of the refugee camp where he lives, which is the only source of income to the family and a profitable project to Atallah and his family.

Atallah is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary food supply he needs to make basic meals such as: meat, vegetables,bread.., and improving the restaurant's condition such as: purchasing additional chairs and tables, painting. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase necessary food supply and improve the restaurant's condition

loans.name: Hamzeh

texts.en:
Hamzeh is photographed in his office while he is working.
Hamzeh is a 26 years old young man, he is married with no children yet.
For the past three years, Hamzeh has been opening an office that offers public services to customers such as: translating documents, printing and copying materials and papers, typing..etc, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to him.

Hamzeh is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing computers, copier and printing machine in order to improve the quality of his work . This will increase the size of work and so improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase computers, copier and printing machine to improve the work

loans.name: Shadia

texts.en:
Shadia is photographed in her house next to some of her embroideries.

Shadia is a 36 year old woman, she is married and a mother with three sons and two daughters. 
For the past six years, Shadia has been doing different types of embroideries and selling them to shops and to customers upon their request, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to the family.

Shadia is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more textiles, threads and beads, that are necessary to complete her work. This will enable Shadia to maximize number of embroideries she makes which will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase textiles, threads and beads

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is photographed in his house that will live in with his coming wife soon.
Ali is a 23 year old young man, he is engaged and prepare to get marry soon.
Ali is a worker who gets low salary, which is not enough to cover his wedding expenses, so he is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new home furniture preparing to his wedding such as: bedroom furniture, living room furniture, dinning room furniture. This will offer to Ali suitable home furniture and prepare his home well before getting marry.

loans.use: To purchase necessary home furniture

loans.name: Sokhan

texts.en:
Sokhan (in the photo) is 36 years old and her husband; Doeurn is 43 years old, live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have two sons and two daughters-one is married, two attend school and another one is assisting his parents in the business. 

Sokhan and her husband produce and sell fertilizer. She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike and a trailer to carry fertilizer for sale. She also use a part of the loan to buy materials needs in her business.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike and a trailer to carry fertilizer for sale.

loans.name: Ramonita

texts.en: Ramonita is from Purok-3, Solinog, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is 57 years old. Ramonita is married and has two children. To make a living, Ramonita sells herbal medicine, herbal soap and any herbal alternatives. She's engaged in her business for 7 years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2008, Ramonita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Ramonita is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to buy more herbal products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to buy more herbal products to sell

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is married who has two children. Victoria is 54 years old, and resides at Rizal, Zamboanga del Norte: Philippines. Victoria own and operate a farm land, planting & harvesting banana for sale to earn a living and she's been 6 years in this business. Each month, she earns 4,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 7,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2011, Victoria joined GDMPC. In the future, Victoria wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Divine Grace

texts.en: Divine Grace is a 22-year-old married woman with a 2-year-old child. Her husband works as a driver. Divine sells food items to her community in Dauis, Bohol. She sells banana and camote (sweet potato) cue, pan cakes and rice cakes. Divine is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as sugar, flour, cooking oil and bananas. She hopes for her business to grow and be able to save for her child's future education.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar, flour, cooking oil and bananas

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en: Merlinda is a married with three children. She is 58 years old and lives in Rizal, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. Merlinda owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 6 years and earns PHP 3,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Merlinda has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. In the future, Merlinda's plan is to save her returns in order to renovate their house.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals

loans.name: Graciana

texts.en:
Graciana is 51 years old and is a married woman with 6 children with ages between 17 and 25. She started her sari-sari store business 2 years ago. She sells snacks, sugar, vinegar, soy sauce and other various items. Graciana is able to help provide for her family's daily needs through her business.

Graciana is requesting a loan to buy more items to sell such as softdrinks, snacks and canned goods. She hopes for sari-sari store to grow and for her children to finish college and become successful.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as softdrinks, snacks and canned goods

loans.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna is a married who has 8 children. Edna is 57 years old, and resides at Balili, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte: Philippines. Edna own and operate a farm land, planting & harvesting banana for sale to earn a living and she's been 5 years in this business. Each month, she earns 2,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 6,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2010, Edna joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Edna wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en: Juanita is a 51-year-old married woman with 5 children aged between 15 and 28. Her husband works as a driver. Juanita is a meat vendor. She particularly sells pork meat to her community in Dauis, Bohol. She earns 4000 PHP per month doing this business. She is requesting a loan to purchase pigs and food containers. Juanita hopes for her business to grow and for her children to finish college.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and food containers

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en: Angelina, is married having four children. Angelina is 33 years old, residing at Alindahaw, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. Angelina sells fish while her husband does the fishing to earn a living and she's been 6 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 15,000.00 to repair their fishing boat. Angelina in 2011 joined GDMPC. In the future, Angelina wants to build house and to finished the study of her children.

loans.use: to repair their fishing boat.

loans.name: Agapita

texts.en: Agapita is married, 44 years of age, and lives in San Carlos, Tukuran, Misamis Occidental together with her 4 children. Agapita is operating a sari-sari store to earn a living. She has been in this business for more than 5 years and she earns 2,000 PHP every month. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store. She joined GDMPC last 2011. In the future, Agapita will use her income to support her 4 children in their studies until they finish college and also in their daily needs. Agapita wishes that their business will be more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her general store

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Gliceria

texts.en:
Gliceria is a 63-year-old married woman from Dauis, Bohol. Her husband works as a fisherman. Gliceria is a food vendor. She sells cassava and pancakes to her community. She earns 2000 PHP per month doing this business.

Gliceria is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as cassava, sugar, coconut milk. Gliceria hopes for her business to grow. She also hopes to renovate their house soon.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as cassava, sugar, coconut milk

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en: Maricel is 43 years old, residing at Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. She is married and has 7 children. Maricel is operating a fishing business venture. She sells the fish which her husband caught from ocean. She's been 15 years in this business and gets 3,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase fishing equipment including hooks & nets. In 2008, Maricel joined GDMPC. In the future, Maricel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks & nets

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: Estrella, married, is 54 years old, residing at San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. Estrella owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been 2 years in this business. Each month, she earns 1,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 3,000.00 to buy stocks such as shampoo, milk, food items, and etc. In 2008, Estrella joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Estrella hopes for business expansion.

loans.use: to buy stocks such as shampoo, milk, food items, and etc.

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a 42-year-old married woman with 2 children ages 14 and 15. Her husband is a fisherman.

Vilma is a fish vendor. She earns 3000 PHP per month selling fish to her community in Dauis, Bohol. Vilma does her best to support her family, especially her children's education. Vilma is requesting a loan to buy more fish to sell. She hopes for her business to grow and for her children to finish college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en: Luzminda is a married woman having 3 children. Luzminda is 44 years old, residing at Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur: Philippines. Luzminda is operating a fishing business venture, selling seafood products including fish, crabs and shrimp in the local community to earn a living and she's been 12 years in this business. Each month, she earns 2,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 4,500.00 to purchase more fish to sell. In 2008, Luzminda joined GDMPC. In the future, Luzminda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 45 years old and is a married woman with 3 children with ages 13, 18 and 23. She sells viands to her community in Dauis, Bohol. Norma goes around her neighborhood to sell food. She earns 200 PHP daily with her business.

Norma is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as pork & chicken meat, vegetables and spices. Norma hopes for this loan to help grow her business. She also hopes for her family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as pork & chicken meat, vegetables and spices

loans.name: Ma. Flor

texts.en:
Ma. Flor is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 40 years old. Ma. Flor is married and has 7 children. 

To make a living, Ma. Flor is running a retail store, selling a variety of food and home used products in the local community. Ma. Flor has been in her business for 2 years and earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Ma. Flor is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to buy more items such as soaps, canned goods and etc. In 2011, Ma. Flor joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy more items such as soaps, canned goods and etc.

loans.name: Simeona

texts.en:
Simeona is a food vendor from Dauis, Bohol. She is married with 5 children. Her husband works as a farmer. Simeona cooks viands that she sells to her community. She is able to help buy her family's daily needs through her food business.

Simeona is requesting a loan to buy food containers and ingredients such as meat and vegetables. She hopes to have a progressive business and successful children.

loans.use: to buy food containers and ingredients such as meat and vegetables

loans.name: Lizelda

texts.en:
Lizelda is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. She is 34 years old, married with 2 children ages 9 and 11. Lizelda's husband is also a farmer.

Lizelda primarily grows rice crops to sell. Lizelda works hard to keep their farm productive because her family relies on farming. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor. Lizelda hopes that through their business, her family will experience a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 34-year old resident of San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She provides her 4 children needs from the little amount of 5,000 she gains monthly from their barber and vulcanizing shop business. This business is almost 10 years and this serve as an aid to the income gained from her husband. However in 2008, Juliet joined GDMPC, and she applies a loan at GDMPC micro finance of 10,000 to buy more equipment's and materials such as rubber and etc. Juliet wants to make expansion to her business one day.

loans.use: to buy more equipment's and materials such as rubber and etc.

location.town: San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Mendgul

texts.en: Mendgul is a 38 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Bayan-Ulgii province in Western Mongolia. Her 2 children study at the secondary school. Her husband assistant driver of a bus. Also, her husband started selling cars in 2010. Mendgul makes traditional clothes, souvenir products and trades them. The business has been profitable but they need specific amount of finance to develop the business. Mendgul is a good-natured woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity to improve the household and save for my 3 sons future. I think this business is being better than previous". The total amount she is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy cars for her husband business.

loans.use: To buy cars

loans.name: Hadbaatar

texts.en: Hadbaatar is a 33 years old man who lives with his wife and 2 children in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. His daughters go to the secondary school and a kindergarden. His wife operates sewing business. He started taxi service business in 2009. Now he runs the cargo business with his truck. He has made many customers in the town and the surrounding areas. But due to the bad roads in the countryside, the truck trailer has been broken down. Hadbaatar is a responsible man who says that ""I would like to expand the business activity by making the truck trailer repaired. I want to continue the business successful"". The total amount he is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to repair his truck trailer.

loans.use: To repair his truck trailer

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is from Militar, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 42 years old. Wilma is married and has 3 children.

To make a living, Wilma owns and operates a business venture, selling baked goods in the local community. Wilma sell it by door to door basis to her "suki" buyer. Wilma has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 2,500 PHP a month from these activities.

Wilma is requesting a loan of 4,800 PHP, which will be used to purchase raw materials in making "bibingka". Bibingka is a rice cake (usually plate-size, yellowish and flat). It is served in a mold lined with banana leaves. 

Recently Wilma joined GDMPC to seek for financial Assistance as additional investment to her business. She plans to use the income generated to expand her business and portion of it will be save for her future.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials in making "bibingka"

loans.name: Marlynda

texts.en:
Marlynda is 46 years old and is a married woman with 3 children ages 9, 15 and 18. Her husband works as a farmer. She makes roofing materials out of nipa palm leaves. Marlynda has had this business for 16 years. She earns about 8000 PHP per month selling nipa roofing materials.

Marlynda is requesting a loan to buy more materials such as nipa and uway (a type of rattan palm). Marlynda hopes to have a stable income and be able to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more materials such as nipa and uway

loans.name: Huat

texts.en: Huat lives with his wife and a son in Bayan-Ulgii province in Western Mongolia. His son studies at the secondary school and his wife is retired. He has started food market business in 1998. Due to the change at the building, and since 2006 he started retailing motorcycles and spare parts with the previous business assets. The business has been beneficial because the need of motorcycle always exist in the countryside. He is an experienced businessman on the trading. Huat is a responsible and idea man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by purchasing few motorcycles ans I plan to sell them in the countryside". The total amount he is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to buy the motorcycles.

loans.use: To purchase motorcycles

loans.name: Gombojav

texts.en: Gombojav is a 46 years old man who lives with his wife and 3 children in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. His 3 children study at the college and high schools. Gombojav started his food selling business since 2005 and in 2006 he start to operate cafeteria. Also, In 2010, he started renting a shop counter where he trades underwear, children clothes and etc. He has a truck by which he brings the supplies. He feels the market demand and work out the appropriate plan for the business. Gombojav is a diligent man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by purchasing the supplies in large quantities so that I could raise the income". The total amount he is requesting is 700,000 MNT to buy  more garment.

loans.use: To buy  more garment

loans.name: Florentina

texts.en:
All her life, Florentina had devoted her time in raising hogs and engaged herself into buy and sell of banana.

Florentina is loving and industrious mother to her six grown up children. She both stand as mother and father to her children. Despite her situation in life, still she stand firm and work hard to sustain their basic commodities. She really thank God for the guidance, protection and unending love for her family. Shortage of income had pushes her to strive hard in running her livestock business. Currently, she raised two fattening and one sow.  She needs to provide her hogs with proper nutrition and care in order to improve their growth until they reach their optimum growth. But due to inadequate capital, she is asking for financial assistance,amount of P10,000 allowing her to buy feeds and vaccine for her raised hogs.She hopes to obtain this loan amount to make her goals attain.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vaccine for her raised hogs

loans.name: Janelyne

texts.en:
Janelyne is capable of doing extra ordinary things for her family because she would like to have a better way of living. She is 32 years old, married and have been blessed with only one child.

Janylyne runs her restaurant for more than five years. She is glad because despite her hardship experiences in her business still, she is able to overcome all those things through the financial support given to her by the lenders.  She had paid back her previous loan and ask for another loan amounting to P10,000.This amount will be use to buy raw meat, vegetables and ingredients for her restaurant business. This amount is really of great favor to her part as business woman because she have the chance to improve the viand she serve to her costumer. In this sense, she could encourage more costumer which will give her greater income which will serve for her family needs.

loans.use: to buy raw meat, vegetables and ingredients for her restaurant business

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is married woman and peacefully living within the village of Pinto Alfonso Lista. She and her husband both work hard in order to obtain success in life. The couple were blessed with three children. Two of her children had already finished their bachelor degrees and currently working, while the youngest is still studying. 

Janet owns and has operated her bakery for more than three years. She aims to improve the quality of her homed-made breads in order to encourage more costumer to buy and patronized it. She is really thankful because she had supportive husband in running their business. 

Janet would like that her youngest child could also finish her studies to be able to find better opportunities in life. So, to make her goals obtain, Janet would like to take out for a loan amounting to P10,000 which will be use in buying flour, oils, sugar and other ingredients of breads. She knows that through her loan availment, she could ensure that her breads offered are delicious and well-improved. In this way, she could obtain greater profit which will enable her to educate her youngest child and sustain their family basic needs.

loans.use: to be use in buying flour, oils, sugar and other ingredients of breads

loans.name: Crestita

texts.en:
Crestita is 52 years old, happily married and have been blessed with four grown up children. 

The main source of income of Crestita’s family, comes primarily from her retail store. She has been in this kind of business for almost ten years. The result of her labor had really makes her thankful to Almighty God who had given her the strength in facing all the challenges in her life. 

Crestita would like to buy stock of groceries such as soft drinks, breads, assorted biscuits, ingredients,canned goods,shampoo, detergents soap and other basic needs. With this regards, she is requesting for a loan amount of P10,000. She believes that through this loan amount, she could expand her business and make it more profitable which will enable her to provide her costumer satisfactory.

loans.use: buy stock of groceries such as soft drinks, breads, assorted biscuits, ingredients,canned goods,shampoo, detergents soap and other basic needs

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christina is 30 years old yet single. Since she is single, she made her own rule to help her parents in improving their way of living.

She started running her variety store since 2007. Within that period of time, she has been joyously do her daily routines in order to make for living. Christina is glad because her patience and sacrifices made her a better entrepreneur. By this time, she would like to increase the volumes of her merchandise due to immediate sold out and minimize her expensive fare expenses in going to and from the market. In this situation, she needs bigger capital to buy stock merchandise. So, she is asking for a loan amounting to P10,000. She hopes that this loan amount would really helpful in obtaining her goals in life to further supply her family needs and make her business more productive.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for retail store

loans.name: Hero's Group

texts.en:
Hero is a young Iraqi wife. At the age of 28, she is a mother of three children and to contribute to the family's income she has been using her sewing skills for the past 5 years to work on her family's clothing needs and also on custom orders. 

From a small corner in her home she makes dresses and other fabric household items, while also taking care of the children and her household. 

Hero took a small loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq in order to purchase an over machine and some nice fabric and raw materials to be able to provide more choices and a better service to her customers.

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

loans.use: to purchase an over machine and some nice fabric and raw materials

loans.name: Bnar's Group

texts.en:
Bnar is a 27 year old young Iraq wife. Together with her husband they are building the foundations for a nice family and Bnar has been working as a seamstress and tailor for the past 6 years.

In the past Bnar successfully applied, received and repaid a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq, which she used to purchase a new sewing machine, a small furniture item to improve her work area, and fabric. 

Now, Bnar took a new loan to further improve her work opportunities. She would like to purchase an over machine and also some additional nice quality fabrics and raw materials to provide a better service to her customers.

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

loans.use: to purchase an over machine and nice quality fabrics and raw materials

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is aged 52 and married with four children with the first three being adults and the last aged thirteen and still schooling. He has been in farming for twenty solid years and currently produces mainly bananas, maize,fruits and milk which are sold to the local market. He also works a as a security officer with a local security firm.

James has requested a loan of 95,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He hopes farming income will improve significantly with the acquisition of hybrid dairy cow. He plans to expand the dairy business with consistent increase of the number cows he rears.

James says the local markets need to be developed in order for farmers to get better income from their farms. He adds drought too remains a challenge. He holds the opinion that Juhudi Kilimo has the best loan services compared to other institutions with the same services.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo, photographed in the Auto repair work shop he has.

Mona is a 43 year old woman, she is married and a mother with one son and two daughters. 

For the past 14 years, Mona's husband has a workshop for repairing and painting Autos, located in an area that has a few workshops of this sort, it has been a profitable project and the only source of income to the family.

Mona is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing new Auto repairing kit. This will enable Mona's husband to improve the quality of his work and increase the family's income to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To purchase new Auto repairing kit

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a farmer in Kitale area of Western Kenya. He is aged thirty seven and married with four children aged between fifteen and four years. He has employed one farmhand and sells his produce of milk, maize and vegetables to the local market. He runs a motorcycle transport besides the farming business.

Francis has requested a third loan from Juhudi Kilimo amounting to 82,400 KES after the first and second ones of 30,000 KES and 60,000 KES respectively. He will use the third loan to buy and insure   a dairy cow at 62,400 KES and construct a dairy unit at 20,000 KES.He hopes to have five dairy cows in five years and rank among the leading suppliers for the local processing plants in the area.

He appreciates Juhudi Kilimo loan services but says animal food shortage and diseases still remains a challenge

loans.use: To a dairy cow and construct a dairy unit

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a resident and a farmer in Kitale area of Western Kenya.He has been in active farming for  over seventeen years. He is aged  thirty eight and married with six children aged between sixteen and two years.

Moses has made a loan request amounting to 41,600 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He is optimistic he will be able to meet his family basic needs and educate the children with his farming income.

Moses says the major challenge in farming for the residents is the poor roads network which delays delivery of produce to the markets.

loans.use: To buy and insurea dairy cow

loans.name: Nayef

texts.en:
Nayef is photographed in his store for selling car's accessories.
Nayef is a 23 year old single young man, he lives with his family contains 12 members, his mother is a school teacher and his father is not employed.

For the past five years, Nayef has been opening a store for selling car's accessories, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to him, which help to cover his family's costs and needs.

Nayef is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing bulk of car's accessories for sale. This will increase sales especially that it is the only store for selling car's accessories in the area where he lives, which will lead to improve the family's income positively.

loans.use: To purchase bulk of car's accessories

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia is aged 42 and has been in farming for five years and employs one farmhand with her farm producing and selling eggs and vegetables.She also runs a tailoring shop which generates additional income to that of farming.She is married and has three children aged between fourteen and eight years.

Teresia has made a loan request amounting to 31,200 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow.She believes the acquisition of a dairy cow though through a loan will earn her good income and help in improving the living standards of her children with milk being available for the family consumption besides being sold to repay the loan as well as meet other family basic needs.

For Teresia,the major challenge in farming is caused by animal diseases which eats into their  farming income

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Protus

texts.en:
Protus is a resident and farmer in Kitale, Western Kenya. He is aged 25 and married with three children aged between eight and three years. His farm produces milk, tomatoes and eggs for the local market. He has been in farming for five years and currently employs one farmhand.

Protus has requested a loan of 52,000 KES from to buy and insure a dairy cow. He hopes this will enable him improve his income significantly to meet family needs and increase the number of his dairy cows to three within five years.

He laments that high costs of animal feeds coupled with their regular treatment remains a challenge.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 28 years old and married to Joyce. Together they have one child. He is a farmer and has been in the business for the past seven years.

This is his first loan.He was introduced to KADET LTD by a client who is already registered by KADET.He will use the loan amount to purchase fertilizer and seedlings is for planting.

He hopes to boost his farming so as to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings is for planting.

loans.name: Girvosio

texts.en:
Girvosio is a resident of Nkubu in Central Kenya region where he lives with his family of four children all of school going ages. He has been in farming for eleven years and manages his farm with the help of one farmhand and produces cabbages,pawpaw,bananas and cassava for the local market.

Girvosio has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a water tank and irrigation pipes. He says these will help in irrigating his farms especially bananas plantation and the improved production will be sold to the local market to meet family basic needs.

He however says high costs of production and poor transport costs remain the major challenges to farmers in the area.

loans.use: To buy water tank and irrigation pipes

loans.name: Wamalwa

texts.en:
Wamalwa is aged 48 and married with seven children aged between twenty one and two years and has been in farming for seven years. He runs his farm with the help of one farmhand. He is also involved in motorcycle transport business. His farm produces milk and vegetables which he sells within the local market.

Wamalwa has requested a loan a loan first of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He says the hopes to get enough milk for family consumption as well generate more income from the sale to meet other family needs.

Wamalwa says the challenge remains animal diseases and food shortage during dry seasons. He however remains optimistic with the farming business.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Sa'dya

texts.en:
Sa'dya is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.
Sa'dya is a 28 year old young woman, she is married and a mother with two sons and two daughters, her husband is a school teacher who earns a salary, but not enough to cover all the family's needs and costs.

Sa'dya is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing new computer, which will help him to prepare the necessary and requested reports and exams for his students. 
This will enable Sa'dya's husband to improve his work and enhance his skills in using computer and prepare requested documents to school on time.

loans.use: To purchase computer

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is a resident of Kitale area of Western Kenya where he has practiced farming for over thirty five years. He currently employees one farmhand and produces milk, maize and beans for the local market. He is married with ten children aged between thirty two and fourteen years with the last four still schooling. His family entirely depends on farming for their upkeep.

Michael has made a loan request amounting to 83,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure two dairy cows. He says the income from the dairy cows will help boost his farming income which he will use to pay school fees for the four children who are still schooling.

Michael laments of frequent fluctuations in milk prices. He is glad to have joined Juhudi Kilimo for loan services and focuses on repayment of the loan in time and acquiring bigger amounts.

loans.use: To buy and insure two dairy cows

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 24 years married to Peter. She has an M-pesa shop a business she has been doing for the past two years and earns a monthly income of KES 25,000. 

She wants to apply for more business float in her business and therefore has requested for a loan of KES 30,000. The profit from this business would help her open another M-pesa branch. 

Her dream is to buy a car and a plot for her family. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To apply for more float for her business.

loans.name: Barnaba

texts.en:
Barnas is aged 65 and has been in active farming for  six years producing and selling  poultry and milk to the local market. He also carries out a retail business in the local market to supplement the farming in come. He is married with six children aged between thirty and eighteen years.

Barnabas has requested a loan of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. This is his second loan with Juhudi Kilimo after the first one of the same amount. He says the acquisition of additional dairy cow will improve the family milk production and help improve the living standards of the family. He focuses on having at least five dairy cows.

Barnabas however says farmers are facing great challenge from animal diseases. He appreciates Juhudi Kilimo for the loan products.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Celestina

texts.en:
Celestina works hard to support her family. Celestina is married and has a purified drinking water and soft-drinks retail business in the Philippines.

Celestina requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of purified water and soft-drinks to sell to customers.

Celestina has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Celestina would like to save money to expand her business.
